storyText:
Bowser stood atop his {JJ1}, lava-surrounded castle, gazing at the framed portrait of Princess Peach he kept on his bedside {NN_Furniture1}. His massive {NNS_BodyPart1} traced the edges of the frame as he sighed, steam {VBG1} from his nostrils.

“She’s just… perfect,” he muttered to himself, tail swishing behind him. “Her smile, her hair, her {NN_BodyPart1}, her—”

A loud, {JJ2} cough interrupted his {VBG_Stative1}. {NN_Person1} hovered nearby, adjusting his {NNS_Clothing1}. “Your Majesty, {Exclamation1}! Might I remind you that the princess has rejected every {JJ3} romantic gesture you’ve ever attempted?”

Bowser {VBD_Onomatopoeia1}. “That’s just because I haven’t found the right one yet. This time, she’ll see how much I {VB_Stative1}!”

Later that evening, Bowser arrived at Peach’s castle in a {JJ4}, flower-covered airship, flanked by legions of Koopa Troopas and {NNS1}. The ship descended {RB1} onto the palace grounds, and Bowser {VBD_Movement1} forward, holding a bouquet the size of a {NN_Concrete1}.

Peach, standing at the entrance with her {NNS_BodyPart2} crossed, {VBD_Onomatopoeia2}. “Bowser, what is this?”

“A {JJ5} declaration of {NN_Emotion1}!” Bowser boomed, spreading his arms wide. “I’ve written you a poem, forged a {JJ6} statue in your honor, and I even—”

“Bowser.” Peach {VBD_Action1} the bridge of her nose. “I’m flattered. {RB2}. But for the {JJS_Ordinal1} time… no.”

Bowser’s grin faltered. “But why? I’m strong, I'm {JJ7}, I have my own kingdom, I—”

“{Exclamation2}, you kidnapped me again last week.”

“That was a misunderstanding!”

“You locked me in a {NN_Concrete2}.”

“For {NN_Abstract1}!”

Peach sighed, rubbing her {NNS_BodyPart3}. “Bowser, you’re just not my type. I don’t know how to make this {JJR1}.”

Bowser deflated slightly, shoulders {VBG2}. “Not even a little {JJ8} bit?”

“No.”

{NN_Person1} floated up beside Bowser, patting him on the {NN_BodyPart3}. “Come on, Your Majesy. Let’s go home.”

Bowser {VBD_Action2} back to the airship, tossing the bouquet over the side. A Chain Chomp {RB3} caught it in its {NNS_BodyPart4}. As the airship ascended, he cast one last, {JJ9} look at the princess below.

“Maybe next time…” he {VBD_Communication1}.

Peach {VBD_Transitive1} her eyes and walked back inside, already forgetting the {JJ10} ordeal.

Do you think your {NNS_FamilyMember1} are too into Brain rot? Do you {VB_Stative1} the word Skibidi toilet? Then come on down to {NN_Place1}'s Brain rot Brawl, the number {Number1} place to cure your {NNS_FamilyMember1}'s Brain rot! The first thing you need to do is learn your {NNS_FamilyMember1}'s hobbies! Weather its {NN_Job1} or {NN_Job2}, we love all of your hobbies! Next up, {NN_Person1} Has to grab a bar of {NN1} to wipe out the Brian rot. and then you're done! The bill is {Number2} dollars, so if want to do this, come down {NN_Date1}!

"Time to go to <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN1" title="NN1" contenteditable="false">bed</span>!" spoke <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person1" title="NN_Person1" contenteditable="false">Sally</span>. Her brother was in the bathroom getting ready to <span class="placeholder" data-id="VB_Intransitive1" title="VB_Intransitive1" contenteditable="false">sleep</span>. First, he brushed his <span class="placeholder" data-id="NNS_BodyPart1" title="NNS_BodyPart1" contenteditable="false">teeth</span>. Then he spat out the remains of his <span class="placeholder" data-id="Liquid1" title="Liquid1" contenteditable="false">toothpaste</span>. <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person1" title="NN_Person1" contenteditable="false">Sally</span> did the same thing, except the flavor was <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Food1" title="NN_Food1" contenteditable="false">mint</span>  instead of <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Food2" title="NN_Food2" contenteditable="false">strawberry</span>, which her brother used. Meanwhile, the brother went to the <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_RoomInHouse1" title="NN_RoomInHouse1" contenteditable="false">bathroom</span> and had to go number <span class="placeholder" data-id="Number1" title="Number1" contenteditable="false">two</span>. Finally, they put on <span class="placeholder" data-id="NNS_Clothing1" title="NNS_Clothing1" contenteditable="false">pajamas</span>. They fell <span class="placeholder" data-id="JJ1" title="JJ1" contenteditable="false">asleep</span>  in an instant!

This story begins {Number1} {NNS_UnitOfTime1} ago in a faraway land called {NN_Place1}.  A {NN_Animal1} named {NN_Person1} was {VBG_Movement1} through the jungle when he {RB1} came across a pair of {JJ1} {NNS1}. 
     "{Exclamation1}" he said to himself as he {VBD_Action1} forward to inspect them.  Suddenly, without warning, he was surrounded by {NNS_Animal1}!  He brandished his {NN1} in a {JJ2} attempt to stay safe, but he was quickly overrun and {VBD_Transitive1} by the savage {NNS_Animal1}.  

He awoke {Number2} hours later in a dark place. 
     "Where am I?" he asked to the darkness. No response. {RB2}, he felt around and grasped something {JJ3}. As his eyes adjusted to the darkness, he suddenly realized he was holding a {NN2}.  Feeling {JJ4} and {JJ5}, he took the {NN2} and looked for a source of {NN_Liquid1} to stay alive.  Suddenly, a sound. 
     "Relax, friend, for you are in {NN_Place2}!" Said a {JJ6} {NN_Animal2}.  {NN_Person1} gave a sigh of relief and {VBD_Transitive2} the {NN_Animal2}.
     "When I found you, you were completely covered in {NN3}," she said to him.  "I brought you here to make you better.  How are you feeling?"
     "{JJ7}," he replied.
     "Excellent! A few more {NNS_UnitOfTime2} and you should be right as {NN4}.  In the meantime, you will be safe here."
     {NN_Person1} was not listening. He was too busy thinking of the {NNS_Animal1} that {VBD_Transitive1} him and what he would have to do about it.
    "I need to get back to {NN_Place1}, at once" he said.
    "{Exclamation2}!" she said. "You can't go back there, it's not safe!"
    "I must," he said.  "But I need training. Otherwise I'll be like a {NN5} out there.
     "Very well," the {NN_Animal2} replied.  "I can teach you the ways of the {NN6}, an ancient fighting technique founded by {NN_Person3}.  It will take you many {NNS_UnitOfTime3} to master it, but it can be done."
     "Very well," said {NN_Person1}.
     
So it began. {NN_Person1} became the {NN_Person2}'s {NN7}, and over those {NNS_UnitOfTime3} he learned to have the {NN_Abstract1} of a {NN8}, the {NN_Abstract2} of a {NN9}, and the {NN_Abstract3} of a {NN10}. 

{NN_Person1} the {NN_Animal1} was nearly ready.

     On the day that he left {NN_Place2}, the {NN_Animal2} said to him, " I have one last lesson to teach you. It is known as the {JJ8} {NN11}. Use this, and you will be unmatched."
     "Teach me the {JJ8} {NN11} so that I may {VB_Transitive1} those who dare cross me," he said.
     "Very well. Take this {NN12}."
     "A {NN12}? Are you serious?"
     "Of course! Now, while {VBG_Transitive1} the {NN12}, {VB1} as {RB3} as you can while shouting, "{Exclamation3}!"
     {NN_Person1} tried as his master taught, and as he did, a sudden {NN13} erupted from his {NN_BodyPart} and {VBD_Movement1} across the room.
     "Wow," {NN_Person1} said.
     "Now," said the {NN_Animal2}, "you are ready."

TO BE CONTINUED

CHAPTER 1: 
     "<span class="placeholder" data-id="Exclamation1" title="Exclamation1" contenteditable="false">I can't believe it</span>, we finally made it! Land ho!"<div>Christopher Columbus looked up from his book, "<span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_BookTitle1" title="NN_BookTitle1" contenteditable="false">Navigating by stars</span>", and sighed. This was the <span class="placeholder" data-id="JJS_Ordinal1" title="JJS_Ordinal1" contenteditable="false">fourth</span> time he had been told they had reached <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Place1" title="NN_Place1" contenteditable="false">India</span>, and every time it was just another <span class="placeholder" data-id="JJ4" title="JJ4" contenteditable="false">worthless</span> island.  The Santa <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person1" title="NN_Person1" contenteditable="false">Maria</span> was growing weaker by the <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_UnitOfTime1" title="NN_UnitOfTime1" contenteditable="false">day</span>, and the men were getting <span class="placeholder" data-id="JJ3" title="JJ3" contenteditable="false">tired</span>.  They needed some good news.</div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">"Give me that," he said, taking the </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN2" title="NN2" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">spyglass</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;"> from the ship hand and peering through it. It was hard to see through the thick </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN3" title="NN3" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">fog</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">, but there indeed appeared to be land ahead.</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">"Well I'll be a </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Animal1" title="NN_Animal1" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">monkey</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">'s </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_FamilyMember1" title="NN_FamilyMember1" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">uncle</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">, you may be right. All hands starboard, </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="Number1" title="Number1" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">3</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  o'clock!" </span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">"Do you really think it could be <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Place1" title="NN_Place1" contenteditable="false">India</span>?" asked the ship hand.</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">"I don't know, but my </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_BodyPart1" title="NN_BodyPart1" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">gut</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  tells me that this could finally be our destination.  Let's send out Captain </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person2" title="NN_Person2" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">Dennis</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  and </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="PRP1PSA" title="PRP1PSA" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">his</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  team to see what they find. If we succeed at this, we'll be the most lucrative traders of </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NNS1" title="NNS1" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">spice</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  in the world!"</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">The sun set by the time they anchored offshore.  </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NNS_Animal1" title="NNS_Animal1" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">crabs</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;"> could be seen </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="VBG_Movement1" title="VBG_Movement1" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">skittering</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  along the beach, staying just out of their reach.  </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person2" title="NN_Person2" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">Dennis</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  and </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="PRP1PSA" title="PRP1PSA" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">his</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  crew of </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="Number2" title="Number2" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">twelve</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;"> rowed ashore and set into the wilderness.  The team immediately felt </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="JJ5" title="JJ5" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">nervous</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">.</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">Captain, I have a </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="JJ_Emotion1" title="JJ_Emotion1" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">bad</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;"> </span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;"></span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">feeling about this place. The air smells <span class="placeholder" data-id="JJR1" title="JJR1" contenteditable="false">fouler</span> than usual."</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">"Quiet, </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person3" title="NN_Person3" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">Fred</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">!" the captain seethed back.  The captain seemed to know more than </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="PRP1SUB" title="PRP1SUB" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">he</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  let on, but </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person3" title="NN_Person3" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">Fred</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;"> brushed </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="PRP2PSA" title="PRP2PSA" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">her</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  thoughts aside and continued </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="VBG2" title="VBG2" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">exploring</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">.
     They made camp that night and quickly lit a </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN4" title="NN4" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">fire</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;"> to stay warm.  The captain retreated to </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="PRP1PSA" title="PRP1PSA" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">his</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  tent early while the rest of the crew </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="VBD1" title="VBD1" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">drank</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  late into the night.</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">No one seemed to notice the </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="Number3" title="Number3" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">three</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;"> pairs of eyes reflected from within the trees.</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">Morning came, and as the captain emerged from </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="PRP1PSA" title="PRP1PSA" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">his</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  tent, </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person3" title="NN_Person3" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">Fred</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  approached </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="PRP1OBJ" title="PRP1OBJ" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">him</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="RB1" title="RB1" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">hastily</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">.</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">"Captain, we've noticed something... Unusual.  You may want to see this yourself." </span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">"Very well," said <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person2" title="NN_Person2" contenteditable="false">Dennis</span> </span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">. </span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;"></span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person3" title="NN_Person3" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">Fred</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;"> took </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person2" title="NN_Person2" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">Dennis</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;"> across the camp, and immediately the captain knew what</span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person3" title="NN_Person3" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">Fred</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  was talking about. On the ground were footprints, too </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="JJ6" title="JJ6" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">large</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  to be theirs, with </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="Number4" title="Number4" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">six</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  toes on each foot.</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">"Commander Columbus never said anything about this," <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person3" title="NN_Person3" contenteditable="false">Fred</span>  said with a hint of <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Emotion1" title="NN_Emotion1" contenteditable="false">doubt</span>. </span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;"> "Do you think that maybe this isn't </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Place1" title="NN_Place1" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">India</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;"> </span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;"> after all?"</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">"Go back to your tent," said </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person2" title="NN_Person2" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">Dennis</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">.  "Prepare the crew and be ready to continue as planned." </span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">"But sir, I-" </span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">"THAT IS AN ORDER."</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">"Very well, sir, but with all due respect, I think we need to be more </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="JJ7" title="JJ7" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">prudent</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  about this.  We can be ready in </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="Number5" title="Number5" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">ten</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NNS_UnitOfTime1" title="NNS_UnitOfTime1" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">minutes</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">."</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">"Do it," the captain </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="VBD_Communication1" title="VBD_Communication1" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">commanded</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">.</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;"><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person2" title="NN_Person2" contenteditable="false">Dennis</span> looked down at the footprint as </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person3" title="NN_Person3" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">Fred</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  walked away, and when </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="PRP1SUB" title="PRP1SUB" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">he</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  knew </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="PRP2SUB" title="PRP2SUB" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">she</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  was out of earshot, </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="PRP1SUB" title="PRP1SUB" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">he</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  said quietly:</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">"You can't stop me. I will </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="VBP_Transitive1" title="VBP_Transitive1" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">destroy</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  you and I will take what's mine." </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="PRP1SUB" title="PRP1SUB" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">he</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  wiped away the footprints and went back to camp, hiding </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="PRP1PSA" title="PRP1PSA" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">his</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;"> </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Abstract1" title="NN_Abstract1" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">intent</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">.</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;"><br></span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">Back on the ship, the mood was </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="JJ8" title="JJ8" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">tense</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">.  The men on deck waited with </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="JJ9" title="JJ9" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">bated</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  breath while the crew below were discussing what they would do when they discovered the source of </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NNS1" title="NNS1" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">spice</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">.</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">One said: "When I get home, I'm gonna </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="VB_Transitive1" title="VB_Transitive1" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">kiss</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  my girl and marry her."</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">Another said: "I'll share the money! What could I possibly do with more than </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="Number6" title="Number6" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">a hundred</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  gold anyway?"</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">"And what about you, Commander?" asked one.  "What will you do when you're richer than even a </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Career1" title="NN_Career1" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">Lord</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">?"</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">Christopher Columbus stared at his </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NNS_Food1" title="NNS_Food1" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">crab meat</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  and contemplated the question.</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">"All my life I've considered what I would do with such wealth. When I was a child, I always wanted to be an </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Career2" title="NN_Career2" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">archeologist</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">, and that is still a possibility. But I don't know if I could ever leave the sea. It's in my </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_BodyPart2" title="NN_BodyPart2" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">blood</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  now."</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">The men sat in </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Abstract2" title="NN_Abstract2" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">silence</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">, waiting to hear more.</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">"Also, I've always wanted to take ownership of </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NNP1" title="NNP1" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">The Isle of Man</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">, so I might do that. And I'd start taking </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Activity1" title="NN_Activity1" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">archery</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;"> lessons.  That is what I will do when we find our </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NNS1" title="NNS1" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">spice</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">." </span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;"> Suddenly, there was a thud overhead. Instantly the men stood up and ran to the deck as </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="RB2" title="RB2" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">quickly</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  as they could.  What they saw would haunt them to this </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_UnitOfTime2" title="NN_UnitOfTime2" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">day</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">.</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">The steersman lay dead on the floor. He was pinned to the deck up by a </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN5" title="NN5" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">spear</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  which had been pierced straight into him.
